sentences.english: I'm a cat. My name is Soseki Natsume.
sentences.chinese: 我是名叫夏目漱石的貓。

sentences.english: Natsume has the Alice of fire and is in the Dangerous Ability class.
sentences.chinese: 夏目漱石的愛麗絲火災和在危險的能力一流。

sentences.english: And Natsume Soseki was a typical representative.
sentences.chinese: 夏目漱石即爲當時一代表性文人。

sentences.english: Narumi thinks that Mikan holds the key to save Natsume and change the Academy.
sentences.chinese: 鳴認爲，邁肯的關鍵保存夏目漱石和改變學院。

sentences.english: Ge Er" is among the early works of the famous modern Japanese writer Soseki Natsume."
sentences.chinese: 《哥兒》是日本近代著名作家夏目漱石的早期作品。

sentences.english: Natumesouseki was a famous thinker and writer in modern history of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 夏目漱石是日本近代著名的思想家和文學家。

sentences.english: Natsume Sousaki has created many images of the female sex in his works.
sentences.chinese: 綜觀夏目漱石一生的創作，他塑造了不少女性形象。

sentences.english: Before working as a professional writer, Natsume Soseki was a researcher of British literature.
sentences.chinese: 夏目漱石在成爲專業作家前，是英國文學研究者。

sentences.english: Natsume hates the Academy and is forced to do its dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 夏目漱石恨學院，並被迫做骯髒的工作。
